biotools.summary: Simultaneous alignment and clustering of peptide data. It takes as input a set of peptide sequences and clusters them into meaningful groups. It returns the optimal number of clusters it identified, together with the sequence alignment and sequence motif characterizing each cluster.

bioschemas.name: GibbsCluster
